meanings.sent1: She retypes her essay to correct the mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He often retypes his notes to make them neater.
meanings.sent3: The student retypes the assignment with a sigh of frustration.
meanings.sent4: The writer retypes the final paragraph for emphasis.
meanings.sent5: Mom always retypes important emails to ensure they are clear.

meanings.sent1: He retypes the letter to include the missing details.
meanings.sent2: She retypes the document to fix the formatting issues.
meanings.sent3: The secretary retypes the report with lightning speed.
meanings.sent4: The author retypes the chapter to improve the flow.
meanings.sent5: The student retypes the essay to meet the word count requirement.

meanings.definition: The act of typing something again.
meanings.sent1: Her retypes of the document are always accurate.
meanings.sent2: The retypes of the manuscript are stored in a separate folder.
meanings.sent3: The constant retypes of the form are causing delays.
meanings.sent4: The multiple retypes of the email are confusing the recipients.
meanings.sent5: The supervisor reviews all retypes before final submission.
